author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FRANCINE A LITTLE STRONGER... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE AND HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN LOUISIANA LATER TODAY...
summary:
...FRANCINE A LITTLE STRONGER... ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE AND HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN LOUISIANA LATER TODAY...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Wed Sep 11
 the center of Francine was located near 26.6, -94.1
 with movement NE at 10 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 977 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.
